input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item name information.

Item name:
Fredrick Ramond FR88500GL Egg Glass Replacement Glass

Item keywords:
Finish - miscellaneous
In a traditional style
Brought to you by Fredrick Ramond
UPC is 640665905502
input_text.Response A: Fredrick Ramond FR88500GL Egg Glass Replacement Glass - A beautiful addition to any traditional home, this replacement glass belongs to the Egg collection. Brought to you by the renowned brand Fredrick Ramond, this glass is guaranteed to last and give your home a unique look. Available in a variety of finishes, this glass is also versatile and can be used in a variety of settings. Choose this glass to give your home an elegant and sophisticated look.
input_text.Response B:
This glass is a replacement glass for a Fredrick Ramond product. It's a traditional style.

The UPC is 640665905502.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
